settings.heading-text-columns_heading: Mulch and Weed Mat Solutions for Commercial Planting
settings.heading-text-columns_text:
Wool.Life’s mulch and weed mats are the natural choice for commercial planting, offering unmatched benefits for industries ranging from landscaping and civil engineering to viticulture, horticulture and plant nurseries.

Our New Zealand wool products are designed to promote healthy plant growth while reducing maintenance costs and supporting sustainability efforts.

Whether you're planting vineyards, managing large-scale planting projects in any industry, or cultivating trees for shade, Wool.Life's wool-based solutions are built to deliver long-term results. Contact us

custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
Wool.Life’s mulch and weed mats are engineered for large-scale planting projects, including public green spaces and revegetation.

The dense wool mats suppress weed growth, lock in soil moisture, and break down naturally over time, enriching the soil with essential nutrients.
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2: Wool.Life's solutions reduce the need for chemical weed control and irrigation, helping businesses save time and resources while promoting more sustainable practices. Contact us

custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
For viticulturists and horticulturists, Wool.Life’s mulch and weed mats provide a key solution to maintain soil health and protect valuable crops.

In vineyards, our wool mats suppress weeds and conserve moisture, reducing the need for sprays and irrigation, while gradually releasing nutrients like nitrogen and sulphur to the soil.
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2: Similarly, in commercial horticulture, these mats create ideal growing conditions for fruit and vegetables by stabilising soil temperature and improving water retention, ultimately enhancing both plant growth and crop productivity. Contact us

custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_heading: Nurturing Artisanal Fruit and Growing Projects
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
For businesses focused on artisanal fruit growing, where quality and sustainability are paramount, Wool.Life’s products offer the perfect balance of performance and environmental stewardship.

Our wool-based mats provide a gentle, natural solution that supports the growth of delicate fruit trees and bushes without the need for harmful chemicals.
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2: Whether you’re cultivating organic apples, pears, or berries, Wool.Life ensures your crops thrive with minimal intervention, helping you maintain a sustainable and eco-friendly growing operation. Contact us

custom_css: a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_1:
In plant nurseries, Wool.Life’s mulch and weed mats provide an effective, environmentally conscious solution for nurturing young plants. 

The wool mats protect young saplings and seedlings from weed competition, improve soil structure, and regulate moisture levels to give plants the best possible start.
settings.heading-text-columns-separate_text_2: As the mats break down, they naturally feed the soil, reducing the need for synthetic fertilisers. Wool.Life helps nurseries maintain high-quality, healthy stock while keeping their operations aligned with sustainable practices. Contact us
